DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to describe two cohorts of cystic fibrosis patients treated in 2 different decades in terms of FEV1 (Forced Expiratory Volume in one second) maintenance.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Observational Study to Compare Cystic Fibrosis Patients in Two Decades Before and After 2000
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to describe two cohorts of cystic fibrosis patients treated in terms of FEV1 maintenance from the age of 10 to 15 before and after 2000.
DOC.criteria: Patients with Cystic Fibrosis diagnosed with neonatal screening Patients born between 01/01/1979 and 12/31/1984 (Cohort 1)and patients born between 01/01/1991 and 12/31/1996 (Cohort 2) Patients with at least 2 FEV1 yearly measurements from the age of 10 to 15 Patients with malignant tumor Patients with meconium ileus Patients with transplantation (pneumectomy or lobectomy) Patients involved in any other clinical trial Patients moved to another Clinical Center
